verse.name: v1
verse.lines: God has given you His promise That He hears and answers prayer; He will heed your supplication If you cast on Him your care.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: He will answer ev'ry prayer, He will answer ev'ry prayer, Go to Him in faith believing, He will answer ev'ry prayer.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He will not withhold one blessing, He will give you what is best; God will answer by His Spirit, Ev'ry one who makes request.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He can hear the great petition, And the smallest, over there; Unto God pray without ceasing, He will answer ev'ry prayer.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Take to God your plans and failures, Any time and anywhere; No one e'er has gone unanswered, For He answers ev'ry prayer.
